title: HSC student whose drink was spiked at friend's party reveals symptoms she knew something was wrong
text:
An 18-year-old student has spoken of the terrifying moment she was found unconscious after her drink was spiked at a friend's party.

Ruby* was among 30 classmates who attended the house party just days before they had to sit their end of year HSC school exams.

The Australian teenager said she only consumed three vodka cruisers which she purchased herself - and a fourth drink supplied by the house before her night spiralled out of control.

Speaking to Mamamia, Ruby said started vomiting, wetting her pants and screaming after her terrified friends found her shaking and slurring her words.

An 18-year-old student has spoken of the terrifying moment she was found unconscious after her drink was spiked at a friend's party (stock image)

The young woman said she was having a deep conversation with a friend when she started sweating uncontrollably.

Assuming she was just overheating, Ruby said she decided to hop into the shower to cool down but then her eyes began to roll back into her head.

'I was unconscious - I wasn't responding. I don't remember this but apparently I was looking at her [my friend] straight in the eye and not responding,' she said.

With no memory of the horror that unfolded, Ruby said her concerned friends took her outside when the 'full-blown attack started'.

'I was on the pavement and I was vomiting and urinating myself and screaming. I couldn't stop. It was terrifying... I remember waking up mid throw up but a lot of it I don't remember at all,' Ruby said.

With no memory of the horror that unfolded, Ruby said her concerned friends took her outside when the 'full-blown attack started' (stock image)

Ruby was taken to hospital where she discovered she had been spiked after traces of GHB (liquid ecstasy) and ketamine, also known as horse tranquilliser were found in her system.

She never told her parents or reported the incident to police as she stayed at her cousin's house until she was fully recovered.

More shockingly, Ruby - who's now 23 years old - said she knew everyone at the party, even to this day but she still doesn't have an inkling of who spiked her drink.

*Name has been changed
